deity.name: Tiamat
deity.text: Tiamat is the evil god of wealth, greed, and envy. She is the patron of chromatic dragons and those whose lust for wealth overrides any other goal or concern. She commands her followers to:
► Hoard wealth, acquiring much and spending little. Wealth is its own reward.
► Forgive no slight and leave no wrong unpunished.
► Take what you desire from others. Those who lack the strength to defend their possessions are not worthy to own them.

power.title: Tiamat's Bitter Vengeance
power.fluff: You can channel Tiamat's wrath, gaining the revenge she demands above else

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy hits you with an attack
Until the end of your next turn, the triggering enemy has vulnerable 2 all.
